Docs.typeparam: The type of objects in the source sequence, typically .
Docs.summary: Represents a collection of objects returned from a query.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Data.EnumerableRowCollection%601> is used to contain the results of a LINQ to DataSet query.
An <xref:System.Data.EnumerableRowCollection%601> cannot be directly instantiated because there are no public constructors for this class.

Docs.summary: Returns an enumerator for the collection of contained row objects.
Docs.returns: A strongly-typed that can be used to traverse the collection of objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When used with [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] queries, `Trow` will be of type <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.
This method cannot be overridden.
